Articles.Content:
Hello.

Please read the whole text before replying

My username is Turbojohn. I got introduced to this awesome game by KurtJmac a long time ago (in version .13 or something like that)

But when I was going to buy the game I noticed that it could only be purchased via Paypal, and I had, and still don't, have access to that possibility.

I played the demo, but I saw videos on youtube that teased me what I was loosing, so I pirated the game.

I felt horrible doing so, I don't like pirating games, much less a indie. So I promised that I would eventually buy the game.

When it came on steam, I finally bought it.

I want to apologize the developers, I do not support piracy, but I pirated, and I felt bad about it.

Please do not ban me from the forums, I wanted to get this off my chest, and I would feel like an idiot for being banned just because I made an apology. (It would have been avoided if I didn't make this thread

I'm very happy to finally join the community. And help the devs of this amazing game.

Now I can play the game fairly well, I visited all the celestial bodies and returned from most of them (damn Eve and Eeloo)

But now I deleted my old save, and started a new one. Because my old save was from when the game was pirated and I want to play it from a clean perspective.

I therefore ask Jebediah for forgiveness.

So you came back from the dark side... good... I was tempted to do it, but I finally managed to convince my uncle to lend me his credit card so I could buy the game.

You really are a good person if you're asking for an apology here, and I know it feels awesome to play a game you bought from the makers, especially if it's an indie. Welcome to the family.
